summary: Build a clean business showcase website for Bhuv Enterprises (waterproofing company) that presents the company and provides detailed information about waterproofing services offered to clients and customers.
architectural_notes: Business/site content provided: company name 'Bhuv Enterprises' with waterproofing-focused About copy and services to include Sump Waterproofing, Terrace Waterproofing, and Bathroom Grouting (each with detailed descriptions).
User provided contact details to add to site content: phone +91 8792404477, email service.bhuventerprises@gmail.com.
User requested to add a specific logo asset to the site (logo file needs to be provided/attached).
User requests to add the previously provided tagline to the site branding.
User requests to add the previously provided business address to site contact/details content.
Tagline confirmed by user to use in site branding: "Protecting Structures. Preserving Values."
known_issues: Site logo is not visible (user reports logo not rendering).
Build/deployment encountered a configuration error ("Configuration error encountered. Please reach out to the Caffeine team").
imageRequirements:
## Edit Images
- Optimize/crop the uploaded logo for use as a square app logo (IMG_4371-5.PNG > business-logo.dim_512x512.png)

existing_features.title: Create a responsive business showcase website with clear top-level navigation and page sections that introduce the business and help visitors understand what the company does.
Implement a Services section that lists all services offered, and provide a dedicated detail view for each service with a full description and key information.
Use English for all user-facing text and add sensible placeholder copy and service examples that can be easily edited later (business name, tagline, service descriptions).

Apply a cohesive visual theme across the site (colors, typography, spacing, buttons, cards) with a distinct, professional style appropriate for a business website, avoiding a blue/purple-dominant palette.
Add static image assets for the site (logo and hero banner) and render them in the UI without routing image delivery through the backend.
Replace hardcoded business branding text with values from frontend/src/content/siteContent.ts (e.g., business name used in the header and footer) so business details can be edited in one place.
Add a concise, skimmable 'Business Details' section to the Home page that surfaces key contact details (email, phone, and address) using values from siteContent.contact.
Improve logo presentation and accessibility by ensuring the existing generated logo is displayed crisply in the header with appropriate alt text that references the business name.
Update frontend/src/content/siteContent.ts to reflect the Bhuv Enterprises branding content provided by the user, including business name and the main business overview/description text.

Replace the existing placeholder services in frontend/src/content/siteContent.ts with the three services provided by the user: Sump waterproofing, Terrace waterproofing, and Bathroom grouting, each with an English summary, full description, and a highlights list suitable for the existing Services list and Service Details UI.

Update the About content in frontend/src/content/siteContent.ts (siteContent.about.story / mission / approach) to match the user-provided company copy (team experience, mission, quality materials/techniques, communication commitment), keeping it in clear English and formatted for the existing About page sections.

Update the centralized contact details in frontend/src/content/siteContent.ts to use the user-provided phone number and email address for Bhuv Enterprises (phone: +91 8792404477, email: service.bhuventerprises@gmail.com), replacing the current placeholder values.
Add the user-uploaded Bhuv Enterprises logo to the frontend static assets and use it as the site logo shown in the header.

Update the centralized business tagline in frontend/src/content/siteContent.ts to the exact tagline previously provided by the user, and ensure the tagline is visibly rendered in the site branding (at minimum the Home page hero and the SiteHeader area).

Update the centralized business address in frontend/src/content/siteContent.ts to the exact address previously provided by the user, and ensure all places that show the address (Home page Business Details and Contact page Location card) reflect the updated address.
Fix the site logo not being visible by ensuring the header logo asset path is correct and the logo renders reliably in SiteHeader across environments (local and deployed).
Add the user-provided logo as a frontend static asset and ensure it renders reliably in the site header across environments (local and deployed).
Ensure the business tagline is sourced from frontend/src/content/siteContent.ts and is visibly rendered in the site branding (at minimum in the header and the Home page hero).

Update the centralized business tagline in frontend/src/content/siteContent.ts to exactly: "Protecting Structures. Preserving Values." and ensure that this updated tagline is visibly rendered wherever siteContent.business.tagline is displayed (at minimum in the SiteHeader and the Home page hero).
Use the user-uploaded image IMG_4371-5.PNG as the site logo and ensure the header logo renders reliably across environments (local and deployed) without falling back to the text-based placeholder.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a business showcase website (company overview, branding, clear presentation for visitors)
Add services section/pages that list services and show detailed descriptions for each service
Add more business details/content and incorporate a logo into the site branding (header/hero as appropriate)
Add the user-provided logo to the website branding (header/hero as appropriate)
Add the user-provided tagline to the site branding (e.g., header/hero)
Add the user-provided business address to the site content (e.g., Business Details/Contact section)
Fix the site logo not being visible in the UI (ensure logo renders properly in header)

projectName: Business showcase website with detailed services pages
